alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:10PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Idaho, southwestern Granite and central Ravalli Counties through 345 PM MDT/245 PM PDT/... At 310 PM MDT/210 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Darby, or 9 miles southwest of Hamilton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Darby, Woodside, Pinesdale, Grantsdale, Skalkaho Pass, Charlos Heights, Corvallis and Como. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 28 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
